text: The use of guitar, bass_guitar, keyboard, drum, and classic_guitar is vital to the music's overall sound and performance. This music follows the style of Mozart. It follows a 3/8 time signature and has a playtime of approximately 60 seconds. The music spans about 16 bars and utilizes a pitch range of 5 octaves. Composed in the Major key and played at a fast tempo, it falls under the pop genre.
